jobsy.description: Fetches and lists jobs for you
jobsy.user-prompt: Get 3 job for devops engineers in bangalore, india posted in last 72 hours

Resume Suggestions Agent.description: The following agent is used to perform the following activities: Read resume, take inputs of jobs and review them, suggest updations to the resume based on the job. Can read resumes given a local path.
Resume Suggestions Agent.user-prompt: The job information is given here, based on that generate me suggestions using my resume as reference.

Resume Creator Agent.description: Agent responsible to create resumes and share its accessible URL
Resume Creator Agent.user-prompt: Given this data, please generate me an appropriate resume
